Table of Contents

Namespace Vts.MonteCarlo.Detectors

Classes

AOfRhoAndZDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and Z. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

AOfRhoAndZDetectorInput

Tally for absorbed energy as a function of Rho and Z. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

AOfXAndYAndZDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for Absorbed Energy(x,y,z). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

AOfXAndYAndZDetectorInput

DetectorInput for Absorbed Energy(x,y,z)

ATotalBoundingVolumeDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for total absorbed energy. This implementation works for Analog, DAW processing.

ATotalBoundingVolumeDetectorInput

Tally for total absorption in bounding volume. This works like a reflectance tally rather than a IHistoryDetector because it tallies once the photon enters the bounding volume. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW.

ATotalDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for total absorbed energy. This implementation works for Analog, DAW processing.

ATotalDetectorInput

Tally for total absorption. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW.

Detector

detector abstract class

DetectorInput

detector input abstract class

FluenceOfFxAndZDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Fx. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

FluenceOfFxAndZDetectorInput

DetectorInput for fluence as a function of spatial frequency fx and z

FluenceOfRhoAndZAndOmegaDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for Fluence(x,y,z,omega). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

FluenceOfRhoAndZAndOmegaDetectorInput

DetectorInput for Fluence(rho, z, ft). Fluence in cylindrical coordinates and temporal-frequency.

FluenceOfRhoAndZAndTimeDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for fluence as a function of Rho, Z and Time. This implementation works for Analog, DAW processing.

FluenceOfRhoAndZAndTimeDetectorInput

Tally for Fluence as a function of Rho and Z and Time (theta). This works for Analog and DAW processing.

FluenceOfRhoAndZDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and Z. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

FluenceOfRhoAndZDetectorInput

Tally for fluence as a function of Rho and Z. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

FluenceOfXAndYAndZAndOmegaDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for Fluence(x,y,z,omega). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

FluenceOfXAndYAndZAndOmegaDetectorInput

DetectorInput for Fluence(x,y,z,ft). Fluence in Cartesian coordinates and temporal-frequency.

FluenceOfXAndYAndZAndStartingXAndYDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for Fluence(x,y,z) and starting (x,y). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

FluenceOfXAndYAndZAndStartingXAndYDetectorInput

DetectorInput for Fluence(x,y,z) and starting (x,y). This detector captures Fluence(x,y,z) with respect to the initial tissue starting location (x,y). It was written for adjoint fluorescence simulations.

FluenceOfXAndYAndZAndTimeDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for Fluence(x,y,z,t). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

FluenceOfXAndYAndZAndTimeDetectorInput

DetectorInput for Fluence(x,y,z,t). Fluence in Cartesian coordinates and time.

FluenceOfXAndYAndZDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for Fluence(x,y,z). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

FluenceOfXAndYAndZDetectorInput

DetectorInput for Fluence(x,y,z)

RDiffuseDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for diffuse reflectance. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

RDiffuseDetectorInput

Tally for diffuse reflectance. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW.

ROfAngleDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Angle. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfAngleDetectorInput

DetectorInput for reflectance as a function of angle

ROfFxAndAngleDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Fx and Angle. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfFxAndAngleDetectorInput

DetectorInput for reflectance as a function of spatial frequency fx and exiting theta angle

ROfFxAndMaxDepthDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Fx and MaxDepth. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfFxAndMaxDepthDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of Fx and MaxDepth. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Fx. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfFxAndTimeDetectorInput

DetectorInput for reflectance as a function of spatial frequency fx and time

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Fx. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfFxDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and MaxDepth. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfRhoAndMaxDepthRecessedDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and MaxDepth recessed in air This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfRhoAndOmegaDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and Omega. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfRhoAndTimeDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and Time. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfRhoAndTimeDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and Time. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfRhoDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfRhoDetectorInput

DetectorInput for R(r)

ROfRhoRecessedDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfRhoRecessedDetectorInput

DetectorInput for R(r) recessed in air at a specified z plane

ROfXAndYAndMaxDepthDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and MaxDepth. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndMaxDepthDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and MaxDepth. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndMaxDepthRecessedDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and MaxDepth. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndMaxDepthRecessedDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and MaxDepth, recessed in air at z-plane This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndThetaAndPhiDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for R(x,y,theta,phi).

ROfXAndYAndThetaAndPhiDetectorInput

DetectorInput for R(x,y,theta,phi)

ROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and TimeAndSubregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and Time and Subregion. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing. Method tallies photon weight to time bin associated with pathlength in each region. Integrated R(x,y,t,subregion) will not integrate to R(x,y), independent array ROfXAndY used to determine this. Reference: Hiraoka93, Phys.Med.Biol.38 and Okada96, Appl. Opt. 35(19) -> the sum of the partial path lengths over all the medium is equivalent to the mean total path length (CH found this to be true)

ROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionRecessedDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and TimeAndSubregionRecessed. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionRecessedDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and Time and Subregion recessed in air. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing. Method tallies photon weight to time bin associated with pathlength in each region. Integrated R(x,y,t,subregion) will not integrate to R(x,y), independent array ROfXAndY used to determine this. Reference: Hiraoka93, Phys.Med.Biol.38 and Okada96, Appl. Opt. 35(19) -> the sum of the partial path lengths over all the medium is equivalent to the mean total path length (CH found this to be true)

ROfXAndYAndTimeDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and Time. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndTimeDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and Time. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndTimeRecessedDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and Time. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYAndTimeRecessedDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y and Time, recessed in air. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYRecessedDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ROfXAndYRecessedDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y recessed in air a specified z plane This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

RadianceOfFxAndZAndAngleDetector

RadianceOfFxAndZAndAngleDetectorInput

Tally for radiance as a function of Fx and Z and Angle (theta). This works for Analog and DAW processing.

RadianceOfRhoAndZAndAngleDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for radiance as a function of Rho and Z and Angle. This implementation works for Analog, DAW processing.

RadianceOfRhoAndZAndAngleDetectorInput

Tally for radiance as a function of Rho and Z and Angle (theta). This works for Analog and DAW processing.

RadianceOfRhoAtZDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

RadianceOfRhoAtZDetectorInput

DetectorInput for Radiance(r) for internal surface detector at depth z. Detector captures radiance in downward direction through plane at depth z.

RadianceOfXAndYAndZAndThetaAndPhiDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for Radiance(x,y,z). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

RadianceOfXAndYAndZAndThetaAndPhiDetectorInput

DetectorInput for Radiance(x,y,z,theta,phi)

ReflectedDynamicMTOfFxAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of Fx and tissue subregion using blood volume fraction in each tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ReflectedDynamicMTOfFxAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for Reflected dynamic MT as a function of Fx using blood volume fraction in each tissue region. This detector also tallies the total and dynamic MT as a function of Z. If a random number is less than blood volume fraction for the tissue region in which the collision occurred, then hit blood and considered "dynamic" event. Otherwise, it is a "static" event. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

ReflectedDynamicMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of Rho and tissue subregion using blood volume fraction in each tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ReflectedDynamicMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for Reflected dynamic MT as a function of Rho using blood volume fraction in each tissue region. This detector also tallies the total and dynamic MT as a function of Z. If a random number is less than blood volume fraction for the tissue region in which the collision occurred, then hit blood and considered "dynamic" event. Otherwise, it is a "static" event. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

ReflectedDynamicMTOfXAndYAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of X, Y and tissue subregion using blood volume fraction in each tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ReflectedDynamicMTOfXAndYAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for Reflected dynamic MT as a function of X and Y using blood volume fraction in each tissue region. This detector also tallies the total and dynamic MT as a function of Z. If a random number is less than blood volume fraction for the tissue region in which the collision occurred, then hit blood and considered "dynamic" event. Otherwise, it is a "static" event. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

ReflectedMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of Rho and tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ReflectedMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for ReflectedMT as a function of Rho and Z. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

ReflectedMTOfXAndYAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of X and Y and tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ReflectedMTOfXAndYAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for ReflectedMT as a function of X and Y. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

ReflectedTimeOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of Rho and tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

ReflectedTimeOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for ReflectedTime as a function of Rho and Z. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

SurfaceFiberDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for fiber detection. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

SurfaceFiberDetectorInput

DetectorInput for an actual fiber detector.

TDiffuseDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for diffuse transmittance. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TDiffuseDetectorInput

Tally for diffuse transmittance. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW.

TOfAngleDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Angle. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TOfAngleDetectorInput

DetectorInput for R(r)

Implements IDetector. Tally for transmittance as a function of Fx. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TOfFxDetectorInput

DetectorInput for transmittance as a function of spatial frequency fx

TOfRhoAndAngleDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and Angle. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TOfRhoAndAngleDetectorInput

Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho and Angle. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TOfRhoDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TOfRhoDetectorInput

DetectorInput for T(r)

TOfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for transmittance as a function of X and Y and TimeAndSubregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TOfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionDetectorInput

Tally for transmittance as a function of X and Y and Time and Subregion. This works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing. Method tallies photon weight to time bin associated with pathlength in each region. Integrated T(x,y,t,subregion) will not integrate to T(x,y), independent array TOfXAndY used to determine this. Reference: Hiraoka93, Phys.Med.Biol.38

TOfXAndYDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for reflectance as a function of X and Y. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TOfXAndYDetectorInput

DetectorInput for T(x,y)

TallyDetails

details for each detector that identifies type of detector

TransmittedDynamicMTOfFxAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of Fx and tissue subregion using blood volume fraction in each tissue sub-region. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TransmittedDynamicMTOfFxAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for Transmitted dynamic MT as a function of Fx using blood volume fraction in each tissue region. This detector also tallies the total and dynamic MT as a function of Z. If a random number is less than blood volume fraction for the tissue region in which the collision occurred, then hit blood and considered "dynamic" event. Otherwise, it is a "static" event. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

TransmittedDynamicMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of Rho and tissue subregion using blood volume fraction in each tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TransmittedDynamicMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for Transmitted dynamic MT as a function of Rho using blood volume fraction in each tissue region. This detector also tallies the total and dynamic MT as a function of Z. If a random number is less than blood volume fraction for the tissue region in which the collision occurred, then hit blood and considered "dynamic" event. Otherwise, it is a "static" event. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

TransmittedDynamicMTOfXAndYAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of X, Y and tissue subregion using blood volume fraction in each tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TransmittedDynamicMTOfXAndYAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for Transmitted dynamic MT as a function of X and Y using blood volume fraction in each tissue region. This detector also tallies the total and dynamic MT as a function of Z. If a random number is less than blood volume fraction for the tissue region in which the collision occurred, then hit blood and considered "dynamic" event. Otherwise, it is a "static" event. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

TransmittedMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of Rho and tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TransmittedMTOfRhoAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally for TransmittedMT as a function of Rho and Z. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

TransmittedMTOfXAndYAndSubregionHistDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for momentum transfer as a function of X and Y and tissue subregion. This implementation works for Analog, DAW and CAW processing.

TransmittedMTOfXAndYAndSubregionHistDetectorInput

Tally forTransmittedMT as a function of X and Y. This works for Analog and DAW processing.

dMCdROfRhodMuaDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC reflectance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

dMCdROfRhodMuaDetectorInput

Tally for dMC estimation of the derivative or reflectance with respect to mua as a function of Rho.

dMCdROfRhodMusDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC reflectance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

dMCdROfRhodMusDetectorInput

Tally for dMC estimation of the derivative or reflectance with respect to Mus as a function of Rho.

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC total absorption This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

pMCATotalDetectorInput

Tally for pMC estimation of total absorption currently only for CAW

pMCROfRhoAndTimeRecessedDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC reflectance as a function of Rho and Time. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

pMCROfRhoAndTimeRecessedDetectorInput

Tally for pMC estimation of reflectance as a function of Rho and Time recessed in air.

pMCROfRhoDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC reflectance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

pMCROfRhoDetectorInput

Tally for pMC estimation of reflectance as a function of Rho.

pMCROfRhoRecessedDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC reflectance as a function of RhoRecessed. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

pMCROfRhoRecessedDetectorInput

Tally for pMC estimation of reflectance as a function of Rho recessed in air a height ZPlane

pMCROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC reflectance as a function of XAndY and Time. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

pMCROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionDetectorInput

Tally for pMC estimation of reflectance as a function of X, Y, Time and Subregion. Method tallies photon weight to time bin associated with pathlength in each region. Integrated R(x,y,t,subregion) will not integrate to R(x,y), independent array ROfXAndY used to determine this. Reference: Hiraoka93, Phys.Med.Biol.38 and Okada96, Appl. Opt. 35(19) -> the sum of the partial path lengths over all the medium is equivalent to the mean total path length (CH found this to be true)

pMCROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionRecessedDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC reflectance as a function of XAndY and Time. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

pMCROfXAndYAndTimeAndSubregionRecessedDetectorInput

Tally for pMC estimation of reflectance as a function of X, Y, Time and Subregion recessed in air. Method tallies photon weight to time bin associated with pathlength in each region. Integrated R(x,y,t,subregion) will not integrate to R(x,y), independent array ROfXAndY used to determine this. Reference: Hiraoka93, Phys.Med.Biol.38 and Okada96, Appl. Opt. 35(19) -> the sum of the partial path lengths over all the medium is equivalent to the mean total path length (CH found this to be true)

pMCROfXAndYDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC reflectance as a function of X and Y. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

pMCROfXAndYDetectorInput

Tally for pMC estimation of reflectance as a function of X and Y.

pMCTOfRhoDetector

Implements IDetector. Tally for pMC transmittance as a function of Rho. This implementation works for DAW and CAW processing.

pMCTOfRhoDetectorInput

Tally for pMC estimation of transmittance as a function of Rho.
